They have curtailed buffets in a few casinos. We were planning to visit many casinos on a 60 day RV trip. As of now, we will take precautions ( Latex gloves for instance) at casinos and pay close attention to regional news.
A week? Maybe 2? Soon I’m guessing
They will close when the Government tell them to, or when they start losing money.
Well, they’re closing down all of the casinos in Ohio at midnight tonight, so maybe...
I live in Ohio . Casino's in Ohio are shut down until the end of March.
